{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP54G |revision=v1.1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/24/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX5541 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PKW-WAP54G |ic_id=3839A-WAP54G |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94306MP |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.245 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-G Access Point''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP54G}} OEM Gemtek WX5541 (WX5541_V00) WAP54G v1.1 serial numbers appear to begin with '''MDG1'''. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=159654 Some WAP54G v1.1s may instead use WX5561 boards], like the [[SparkLAN WX-6800]]. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WAP54G_v1.1}}
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wap54g WAP54G series on the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WAP54G On the DD-WRT wiki]
